data.name: Admin_restart
data.value: Restarting... This should take a few seconds.

data.name: Admin_shutdown
data.value: Shutting down...

data.name: Core_color
data.value: ***Poof!*** You're **{0}** now.

data.name: Core_customcolor
data.value: ***Poof!*** You have been assigned the custom color hex **{0}**!

data.name: Core_guildJoinText
data.value: Hi there! Thank you for inviting PaletteBot to your server! {0}, please type `{1}setup` to set up the bot.

data.name: Core_setup
data.value: :arrow_right: Continuing in DMs...

data.name: Core_setup_complete
data.value: Alright, setup is complete. PaletteBot is ready for use!

data.name: Core_setup_syntaxerror
data.value: I couldn't quite understand that. Try again.

data.name: Core_setup_step1
data.value: First off, do you want me to create color roles for you in "{0}"?

data.name: Core_setup_step1_responseno
data.value: Alright then. I won't create role colors.

data.name: Core_setup_step1_responseyes
data.value: Okay! I will create color roles for you! The list of colors I will add is as follows:

data.name: Core_setup_step2
data.value: Next, which roles would you like to be in the color list? (Type in the IDs of the roles, seperated by spaces)

data.name: Core_setup_step2_invalidids
data.value: Hmm...seems like I can't find the role with ID {0} in this server... Try again, perhaps?

data.name: Core_setup_step3
data.value: Finally, do you wish to enable custom color assignment on "{0}"?

data.name: Core_setup_step3_responseno
data.value: Alright, custom colors are disabled for this server.

data.name: Core_setup_step3_responseyes
data.value: Okay, users will be able to assign custom colors to themselves using the `{0}customcolor` command.

data.name: Core_uncolor
data.value: ***Poof!*** You're no longer **{0}**!

data.name: Core_uncolor_multipleRemoval
data.value: ***Poof!*** Your colors have been removed!

data.name: err_cannotAssign
data.value: I can't assign that color if I don't have the Manage Roles or Administrator permission, or it's higher than my role.

data.name: err_ccDisabled
data.value: Sorry, custom colors has been disabled on this server!

data.name: err_exception
data.value: An error occurred while processing this command: {0}

data.name: err_invalidHex
data.value: The hex you typed in is not valid.

data.name: err_noColorsOnAuthor
data.value: You don't have any colors on yourself!

data.name: err_nonexistentColor
data.value: That color does not exist.

data.name: err_notBotOwner
data.value: Sorry, you must be the bot owner to do that!

data.name: err_notSetUpYet
data.value: PaletteBot is not fully set up on this server yet. {0} needs to type "{1}setup" in order to finish the setup process.

data.name: err_removedColor
data.value: Oh dear...it seems that color doesn't exist anymore. I have removed it from the color list.

data.name: err_setupAlreadyInProgress
data.value: Setup is currently in progress.

data.name: err_setupNotOwner
data.value: You don't have permission to set up the bot. (This bot can only be set up by the server owner)

data.name: err_tooFewArgs
data.value: Not enough args have been given.

data.name: err_tooManyArgs
data.value: Too many args have been given.

data.name: err_unknownCommand
data.value: Unknown command.

data.name: err_unusualPerms
data.value: The permissions on this color seem a bit unusual. This color can't be used until the permissions on it are neutralized.

data.value: That role is already in the color list.

data.name: err_roleNotFound
data.value: I couldn't find a role in this server with that ID.

data.name: Core_addroletocolorlist
data.value: Okay, I have added "{0}" to the color list.

data.name: Core_removerolefromcolorlist
data.value: Okay, I have removed "{0}" from the color list.

data.name: err_notAdmin
data.value: You don't have permission to use this command. (Administrator permission required)

data.name: Core_listColors
data.value: __**Here's a list of colors you can assign to yourself on this server:**__

data.name: err_colorListEmpty
data.value: It appear there aren't any colors in the color list. Type "{0}setup" to re-setup the bot, or type "{0}addcolor" to add a color to the color list.

data.name: err_multipleCommandDefs
data.value: This command exists in more than one module. Please report this to @FairPlay137-TTS#8972 via a DM or something.
data.comment: This should only happen if I accidentally do a terrible job copying and pasting some stuff.

data.name: err_noBotOwner
data.value: It appears that no bot owner ID has been specified in config.json! This command can't be used.

data.name: err_nonexistentModule
data.value: I couldn't find that module.

data.name: err_unmetPrecondition
data.value: You don't have permission to use this command.

data.name: Help_modules_commandcount
data.value: *{0} command(s)*

data.name: Help_DMContent
data.value:
Hi there! {1} __**Here's what you can try:**__ Type `{0}modules` to view all available modules. Type `{0}commands (module name)` to view all commands in a module. Type `{0}invite` to get an invite link for this bot!
GitHub: https://github.com/FairPlay137/Discord-PaletteBot
PaletteBot is a work-in-progress, so expect issues to arise.
data.comment: I might revise this in the future.

data.name: Help_DMContentContactBotOwner
data.value: If you encounter an issue, please contact {0}.

data.name: Help_DMContentNoBotOwner
data.value: If you encounter an issue, please tell whoever the bot owner is.

data.name: Help_DMedHelp
data.value: :mailbox: **Check your DMs!** I have sent some useful tips over.

data.name: Counting_lastPlayerStanding
data.value: It appears we have a winner! {0} has won this round! Good job everyone for managing to count to {1}! Stay tuned for the next round!

data.name: Counting_lifeCounter_LastLife
data.value: LAST LIFE!

data.name: Counting_lifeCounter_MoreThanOne
data.value: {0} lives left!

data.name: Counting_loseLife_generic
data.value: {0} has lost a life!

data.name: Counting_loseLife_invalidFormat
data.value: Because {0} posted a non-number, they have lost a life!

data.name: Counting_loseLife_prematurePost
data.value: {0} went twice! Therefore, they lost a life!

data.name: Counting_loseLife_repeatedNumber
data.value: Because the number {1} had been posted already, {0} has lost a life!

data.name: Counting_loseLife_skippedNumber
data.value: Because {0} skipped one or more numbers, they have lost a life!

data.name: Counting_newRound
data.value: NEW ROUND STARTING! I'll start.

data.name: Counting_playerEliminated
data.value: Oh dear, it seems {0} ran out of lives! They are eliminated from the game!

data.name: Counting_resetAllPlayers
data.value: All players' life counters have been reset!

data.name: Counting_startGame
data.value: Welcome to {0}! Start from 1, and count as high as you can! Make sure to not skip or repeat any numbers and keep it as whole decimal numbers, or you'll get a strike! Also, once you post your number, you gotta wait for another person posts the next number before you post your next number! GOOD LUCK!

data.name: Help_introPublic
data.value: I'm **PaletteBot**, a public bot written by FairPlay137-TTS!

data.name: Help_upcomingFeatures
data.value: Here's a list of upcoming features (may not be up-to-date): ``` * Sharding. Pretty much all widespread public bots need this. * Core features. * The rest of the moderation features * The list goes on... ```

data.name: Utils_stats_description
data.value: Hi! I'm **{0}**! I'm based off of PaletteBot, a multi-purpose bot with easy-to-use color assignment! I'm still under construction, so expect stuff to change as time goes on.

data.name: akiDefaultLocale
data.value: us
data.comment: TRANSLATORS: Change this if you want Akinator to start in a different language. Possible options are us, de, fr, in, en, es, cn, ar, il, it, jp, kr, nl, pl, pt, ru, tr
